pr_title: remove superseded non-LTS OpenJDK test jobs

timeline.message: remove OpenJDK13,14 as they are non-LTS and we test 15

timeline.bodyText: So does ZULU13 get special treatment because of Azul MTS, or should we switch to ZULU15?
timeline.author: bantonsson
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -263,7 +263,7 @@ workflows:
           name: test_<< matrix.testTask >>
           matrix:
             parameters:
-              testTask: [ "7", "IBM8", "ZULU8", "11", "ZULU11", "13", "ZULU13", "14", "15" ]
+              testTask: [ "7", "IBM8", "ZULU8", "11", "ZULU11", "ZULU13", "15" ]

replies.bodyText:
We should move to ZULU15 but we need to update the docker image first I believe
https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-java-docker-build/blob/master/Dockerfile
replies.author: richardstartin

replies.bodyText: in fact it seems to acknowledge zulu15
replies.author: richardstartin
